mdRecord.dcterms:description: Write Madison concerning constitution he has written; Jefferson deposited copy in Library of Congress which was then destroyed by fire; sends 6 additional copies of constitution, three of which he asks to be deposted in Library of Congress; hopes constitution will be printed in Spanish to send to Mexico and colonies as well as in French to stop bloodshed in Santo Domingo.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1815 September 5, Paris, [France] to [James] Madison, n.p.
